description.medicalViewer.alpha: The transparency of the label, 0 means completely transparent,1 means completely opaque, the value range is [0,1]. Default: 0.4
description.medicalViewer.nifti.windowWi: The window width of the Nifti data. Default: 2000
description.medicalViewer.nifti.windowLe: The window level of the Nifti data. Default: 1000
description.medicalViewer.dicom.windowWi: The window width of the Dicom data. Default: 2000
description.medicalViewer.dicom.windowLe: The window level of the Dicom data. Default: 1000
